text: Brewster is a village within the town of Southeast, New York in Putnam County, United States. Its population was 2,508 in 2020. The village is the most densely populated portion of the town. The village is named for two early farmers, Walter and James Brewster.Brewster Through the Years 1848-1948, H. Wolff Book Manufacturing Co., New York 1948 == References == Category:Villages in New York (state)
title: Brewster, New York
